abstract: Mr. Nierenberg founded Dansk International Designs, whose cookware and dinnerware helped bring the Scandinavian Modern style to the postwar American table.
snippet: Mr. Nierenberg founded Dansk International Designs, whose cookware and dinnerware helped bring the Scandinavian Modern style to the postwar American table.
lead_paragraph: Theodore D. Nierenberg, a founder and the president of Dansk International Designs, whose popular cookware, flatware and dinnerware helped bring the Scandinavian Modern style to the postwar American table, died on Friday at his home in Armonk, N.Y. He was 86.

headline.main: Theodore Nierenberg, Founder of Dansk, Dies at 86

abstract: Orders and revenue declined as the long housing slump eroded demand, the nation’s two largest home builders said.
snippet: Orders and revenue declined as the long housing slump eroded demand, the nation’s two largest home builders said.
lead_paragraph: D. R. Horton and Pulte Homes, the two largest home builders in the United States, reported quarterly losses and said the outlook for the housing market remained difficult.

headline.main: D.R. Horton and Pulte, Home Builders, Post Losses
headline.print_headline: D.R. Horton and Pulte, Home Builders, Post Losses
